regular.name: Trash Consolidation
regular.short: Brings garbage and recycling to outside bins
regular.long:
- Empty kitchen garbage and recycling when full
- Break down boxes and take them to bins
- Collect loose garbage from around the house

regular.name: Kitchen counters and sink
regular.short: Sanitizes and organizes kitchen prep spaces and sink
regular.long:
- Ensure prep spaces are free of clutter
- Move any ingredients/items to their respective storage areas
- Sanitize counters and sink
- At the end of the week, clean any stray dishes left in sink

regular.name: Entries/Alcove floors and trash day
regular.short: Sweeps and mops entries and alcove and performs trash day duties
regular.long:
- Sweep and mop both front and back entries and alcove
- Take outside bins to curb on Thursday
- Bring bins back from curb on Friday

regular.name: Living room and dining room
regular.short: Cleans and sanitizes tables and entertainment center
regular.long:
- Remove left dishes from tables and wash them
- Put items left in common spaces in lost and found
- Clean and sanitize tables
- Clean and sanitize entertainment center (TV, consoles, etc.)

regular.name: Kitchen and laundry room floors
regular.short: Sweeps and mops kitchen and laundry room
regular.long:
- Sweep and mop kitchen floor
- Sweep and mop laundry room floor

regular.name: Cooking appliances
regular.long:
- Empty crumbs from toaster
- Clean and sanitize inside/outside of both microwaves, outside of fridges, range, and outside of oven

regular.name: Downstairs carpets
regular.short: Vacuums downstairs hallway, basement hallway, and stairs
regular.long:
- Vacuum downstairs hallway
- Vacuum basement hallway
- Vacuum all stairs in the house

regular.name: Upstairs carpets
regular.short: Vacuum upstairs hallway and living/dining room
regular.long:
- Vacuum upstairs hallway
- Vacuum living and dining room (making sure to get under the couches etc.)

rotation.name: Alcove and laundry room
rotation.short: Cleans and sanitizes alcove and laundry room
rotation.long:
- Dust and sanitize large items and shelves in alcove
- Dust and sanitize washer and dryer
- Clean outside of downstairs fridge
- Remove lint from dryer (if any)

rotation.name: Kitchen rags and cleaning rags
rotation.long:
- Wash kitchen rags with detergent (don't create mustard gas by using bleach) 
- Dry rags before returning them to kitchen
